text:
Hey team, has anyone done a project to pull deal information from HubSpot into Google data studio, to blend reports from deals with PPC campaigns? 

Finding this a bit of a challenge

Hi Team I am trying to fetch HubSpot data using Azure Data factory . I have created the dataset as  well as linked service as in <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/64591471/error-when-creating-the-linked-service-for-HubSpot-in-adf>. However I don’t see all the properties of companies. How can I make sure the dataset to include city, description, country ..? Please advise.

Hey y’all, does anyone have experience enabling access to manage custom objects via the API with OAuth app? The docs are a bit confusing re: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects|what scopes are required> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/custom-objects-schema-pilot|if there is special access the OAuth app needs>, specifically for custom objects.
